official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct the project for flood control and recreation in the Upper White Oak Bayou area, Texas.
short_title: Upper White Oak Bayou Flood Control Act of 1981

summary.text: Upper White Oak Bayou Flood Control Act of 1981 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct the project for flood control and recreation in the Upper White Oak Bayou area, Texas.

titles.title: Upper White Oak Bayou Flood Control Act of 1981
A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct the project for flood control and recreation in the Upper White Oak Bayou area, Texas.
